reason: UNDECLARED CIRCULAR DEPENDENCY: Node 1.3 logically depends on Node 1.5 (stationarity of t-PushTASEP, giving f_mu >= 0) and Node 1.6 (ratio identity F*_mu/P*_lambda = f_mu/P_lambda, needed to transfer nonnegativity from f_mu to F*_mu). These dependencies are undeclared. Node 1.3 should be restructured as a CONSEQUENCE of Nodes 1.5 and 1.6, not an independent step.
